QAData.question: Who won between West Ham United and Watford on Tue, 08 Feb 2022 19:45:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: West Ham United won 1–0 over Watford on Tue, 08 Feb 2022 19:45:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Moussa Sissoko is the most accurate passer (94%) in the match.
Michail Antonio has the least touches (31) of any outfield player.
Said Benrahma hit the woodwork 1 times in 3 total shots.
Jarrod Bowen was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.5.
Tomas Soucek won the most duels (13) in the match.
Declan Rice completed the most passes (71) in the match.
Emmanuel Dennis lost the most duels (15) in the match.
Joao Pedro completed the most dribbles (4) in the match.
